譼字的基本解释

譼
jiān
古同“监”。

譼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《集韻》居銜切，平銜，見。］
同“監1”。
作人名用字。南朝梁有萧譼见《梁书·武帝纪下》。

譼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譼； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1185第05
【集韻】監，古作譼。註詳皿部九畫。　又人名。【梁書·武帝紀】義陽王蕭譼。

譼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
譼字的起名意思

暂无。

譼
Basic explanation of words
譼
jiān
Gu Tong "supervised".
譼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Jiyun" has the title cut, flat title, see. ]
Same as "Monitoring 1".
Use words for names. The Southern Dynasties Liang You Xiao Shi see "Liangshu·The Second Record of Emperor Wu".
譼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Ji 1】【Words Department】　譼; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1185 05
[Jiyun] Supervisor, ancient Zuozhen. Note the nine paintings in the Pan Department.　Another name. 【Liang Shu·Wu Emperor Ji】Yiyang King Xiao Zhen.
